unit.name: Saurian Warlord
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm, Cold-Blooded, Light Armour, Born Predator

unit.name: Saurian Veteran
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm, Cold-Blooded, Light Armour, Born Predator

unit.name: Caiman Ancient
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Cold-Blooded, Fear, Strider (Water Terrain), Light Armour, Born Predator

unit.name: Cuatl Lord
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 50x50 mm, Cold-Blooded, Palanquin, Tall, Wizard Master, Aegis (4+)

unit.name: Skink Captain
unit.description: single model, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Cold-Blooded, Strider (Water Terrain), Light Armour

equipment.name: Taurosaur Option: Engine of the Ancients

unit.name: Skink Priest
unit.description: single model, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Cold-Blooded, Strider (Water Terrain), Telepathic Link, Wizard Apprentice

equipment.name: Taurosaur Option: Engine of the Ancients

unit.name: Saurian Warriors
unit.description: 15-35 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm

unit.name: Skink Braves
unit.description: 15-40 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Cold-Blooded, Scoring, Strider (Water Terrain)

unit.name: Temple Guard
unit.description: 15-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm, Bodyguard (General), Cold-Blooded, Fearless, Scoring, Light Armour, Shield, Born Predator, Cobalt Club

unit.name: Raptor Riders
unit.description: 5-12 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Cold-Blooded, Scoring, Shield, Rider: Born Predator, Lance, Raptor: Harnessed

unit.name: Caimans
unit.description: 3-10 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Cold-Blooded, Scoring, Strider (Water Terrain), Born Predator

unit.name: Snake Swarms
unit.description: 2-4 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Cold-Blooded, Fearless, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Unstable, Venomous Tide, Hard Target (1), Poison Attacks

unit.name: Skink Hunters
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Cold-Blooded, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Strider (Water Terrain), Hard Target (1)

unit.name: Chameleons
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Cold-Blooded, Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Strider (Water Terrain), Hard Target (2), Blowpipe (4+)

unit.name: Pteradon Sentries
unit.description: 3-5 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Cold-Blooded, Feigned Flight, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Strider (Forest), Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Rider: Light Lance, Pteradon: Harnessed, Release Rocks

unit.name: Rhamphodon Riders
unit.description: 3-5 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Cold-Blooded, Fearless, Fly (8", 16"), Frenzy, Light Troops, Strider (Forest), Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Light Armour, Rider: Light Lance, Poisoned Javelin (4+), Rhamphodon: Battle Focus, Harnessed, Lethal Strike, Prey Scent

unit.name: Weapon Beasts
unit.description: 1-2 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm

unit.name: Stygiosaur
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Cold-Blooded, Fear, Terror, Towering Presence, Stygiosaur: Born Predator, Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks), Harnessed, Poison Attacks, Stomp Attacks (D3)

unit.name: Thyroscutus
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Cold-Blooded, Stubborn, Skink Crew (4): Poisoned Javelin (4+), Thyroscutus: Crush Attack, Harnessed

unit.name: Taurosaur
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Cold-Blooded, Fearless, Skink Crew (5): Poisoned Javelin (4+), Taurosaur: Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6+1), Sharp Horns

mount.name: Raptor
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Carnosaur
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Fearless, Frenzy, Towering Presence, Battle Focus, Born Predator, Harnessed, Multiple Wounds (2, against Large)

mount.name: Alpha Carnosaur
mount.description: Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Apex Predator, Born Predator, Harnessed, Multiple Wounds (D3)

mount.name: Skink Palanquin
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 50x50 mm, Skink Palanquin, Tall, Harnessed

mount.name: Alpha Pteradon
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Feigned Flight, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Strider (Forest), Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Harnessed, Release Rocks

mount.name: Alpha Rhamphodon
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Fearless, Fly (8", 16"), Frenzy, Light Troops, Strider (Forest), Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Battle Focus, Harnessed, Lethal Strike, Prey Scent

mount.name: Taurosaur
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fearless, Skink Crew (5): Poisoned Javelin (4+), Taurosaur: Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6+1), Sharp Horns

mount.name: Caiman
1x Caiman
2x Caiman
3x Caiman
4x Caiman
mount.description: (max. 1 Caiman for every 10 Skinks), Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Cold-Blooded, Combined Strength, Scoring, Strider (Water Terrain), Born Predator, Halberd

item.name: Ancient Knowledge
item.description: Models with Divination only. Instead of selecting spells, the model knows all spells from Divination. A single Learned Spell may be exchanged for the Hereditary Spell during Spell Selection. Ignore the rules for The Conclave and instead apply the following: spells from Divination gain +3" range, up to a maximum of +9": - For each friendly model part with Telepathic Link within 12" of the Caster - For each additional friendly Wizard without Telepathic Link within 12" of the Caster

item.name: Ancient Plaque
item.description: Dominant. Once per Magic Phase, the bearer may reroll a single Magic Dice when making a casting roll, provided the spell was not Miscast. This ability cannot be used for Casting Attempts with only one Magic Dice.

item.name: Apex Predator
item.description: Universal Rule. When Charging a single model unit with Gigantic Height and/or Fly, the model gains +2" to its Charge Range roll.

item.name: Blowpipe
Blowpipe (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon Range 12", Shots 2, Str 2, AP 0, Poison Attacks, +1 to hit against units consisting entirely of models with Towering Presence.

item.name: Born Predator
item.description: Close Combat Natural to-hit rolls of 1 of attacks with this Attack Attribute must be rerolled.

item.name: Breaker of Spells
item.description: The owner of the model may reroll their first failed Dispelling Attempt in each enemy Magic Phase.

item.name: Cobalt Club
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Strength.

item.name: Cold-Blooded
item.description: The models Discipline Tests are subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Combined Strength
item.description: Universal Rule. Skink Braves may add Caimans to their unit. Caimans are R&F models of a different Model Classification (Large Infantry). Follow the normal rules for determining if the Height of the unit is Standard or Large (see Model Classification). Caimans follow the rules for Matching Bases (see Front Rank), except that they do not have to be placed as far forwards as possible. Instead, they can be placed anywhere in the unit. Skink Braves and Caimans in the same unit do not share a common Health Pool even though they are both R&F models. Instead, they each have their own Health Pool (lost Health Points are never passed between them, and any excess Health Points losses are ignored). - Distributing Hits: When distributing hits onto the unit (i.e. for attacks against the unit as a whole), first distribute hits between R&F models and Characters. Then randomise all hits distributed onto R&F models. Roll a D6 for each hit: 1-4 hits a Skink Brave, 5-6 hits a Caiman. If the Skink Braves lose enough Health Points in order to wipe them out, any excess Health Point losses are alloted to the Champion. - Stomp Attacks: When distributing hits from Stomp Attacks, ignore all models in the unit that are not Standard Infantry. Hits distributed onto Skink Braves are not randomised. - Allocating Attacks: Close Combat Attacks can be allocated as normal towards different Health Pools in base contact: Skink Braves, Caimans, Champion, Character(s). - Swirling Melee: All enemies allocating attacks using Swirling Melee (i.e. attacking R&F models not in base contact) may choose to do this either towards Skink Braves or towards Caimans. If this is used to attack Caimans, the attacks suffer a −1 to-hit modifier.

item.name: Crocodile
item.description: The model gains +1 Armour against Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Egg of the Quetzal
item.description: The bearer gains Breath Attack (Str D3+2, AP 1, Magical Attacks).

item.name: Engine of the Ancients
Taurosaur Option: Engine of the Ancients
item.description: 0-1 Units/Army. The model part gains Telepathic Link. All friendly units within 6" of the Engine of the Ancients gain Aegis (5+, against Ranged Attacks). At the beginning of each friendly Player Turn, you may choose to replace Aegis with one of the following effects until the start of the next friendly Player Turn: - Choose a Path of Magic. The Casting Values of spells from this Path cast by friendly Wizards are reduced by 1. - During the owners Shooting Phase, choose an enemy unit that is not Engaged in Combat and within 9" of the Engine of the Ancients. That unit suffers D3 hits with Flaming Attacks and Armour Penetration 10 that always wound on a roll equal to or greater than “7 minus the targets Armour". A natural 6 always wounds and a natural 1 always fails to wound. This is considered a Special Attack.

item.name: Fire Bola
Fire Bola (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 8", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Giant Blowpipes
Taurosaur Option: Giant Blowpipes (3+)
Giant Blowpipes (4+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon Range 12", Shots 8, Str 3, AP 0, Poison Attacks, Quick to Fire

item.name: Glory of the Dawn Age
item.description: Enchantment: Spear. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, Magical Attacks, and Multiple Wounds (2).

item.name: Grasp of the Immortal
item.description: The model gains Channel (1) and a +1 Casting Modifier. A natural roll of 1 or 2 for Casting Attempts with a single Magic Dice is always a failed Casting Attempt, regardless of any modifiers.

item.name: Great Bow
Taurosaur Option: Great Bow (3+)
Great Bow (4+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon Range 36", Shots 1, Str 3 [5], AP 10, Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Quick to Fire.

item.name: Jade Staff
item.description: The bearer can cast Healing Waters (Druidism) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Jaguar
item.description: The model gains +1" Advance Rate and +2" March Rate.

item.name: Master of Reality
item.description: During Siphon the Veil, the owner must convert Veil Tokens into Magic Dice for a cost of 2:1 (instead of 3:1). At the end of each friendly Siphon the Veil subphase, all Veil Tokens that have not been converted into Magic Dice are discarded.

item.name: Obsidian Tesseract
item.description: One use only. May be activated in the opponents Magic Phase at the end of step 3 of the Magic Phase Sequence (Siphon the Veil). When activated, remove 1 Magic Dice from the opponents Magic Dice pool.

item.name: Palanquin
item.description: Universal Rule. When the model is in a unit with Bodyguard, it gains Stand Behind. The model can be the General even if it is also the Battle Standard Bearer, and it cannot be chosen by the enemy as the model that suffers the penalties for refusing a Duel. The model counts as being mounted.

item.name: Piranha
item.description: The model gains Fear.

item.name: Plaque of the Snake God
item.description: Universal Rule. All Skink* model parts in the same unit as the model gain Hatred. - *The following model parts are considered Skinks: Skink Captains, Skink Priests, Skink Braves, Skink Hunters, Chameleons, Pteradon Sentries - Rider only, Rhamphodon Riders - Rider only.

item.name: Poisoned Javelin
Poisoned Javelin (3+)
Poisoned Javelin (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon Range 12", Shots 1, Str as user, AP as user, Poison Attacks, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Prey Scent
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), if you have one or more units of Rhamphodon Riders or Skink Captains on Alpha Rhamphodon in your army, you must choose 2 units from your opponents Army List (this may also be Characters). The models of these units are considered “marked". Rhamphodon mounts gain +D3 Attack Value and must reroll failed to-hit rolls for attacks allocated either towards marked models, or towards models joined to units with more than half of their models marked. The additional attacks must be allocated towards models meeting either of those criteria.

item.name: Protean Potentate
item.description: The model gains Protean Magic and access to Druidism, and knows all the Learned Spells it now has access to as well as its Hereditary Spell. This Discipline cannot be combined with Ancient Knowledge or the Sun Tablet Artefact on the same model.

item.name: Raptor Spirit
item.description: Models on foot only. The bearer gains +4" Advance Rate, +4" March Rate, and Swiftstride. This Artefact cannot be taken by a model with Rangers Boots.

item.name: Release Rocks
item.description: Special Attack. Sweeping Attack. The enemy unit suffers D3 hits with Strength 4 and Armour Penetration 1 for each Pteradon and Alpha Pteradonin the unit that has not performed this Sweeping Attack in the battle yet.

item.name: Serpent
item.description: The model gains +1 Agility and Fight in Extra Rank.

item.name: Serrate Scales
item.description: Enchantment: Shield. While using this Shield, the bearer gains Grind Attacks (2) that are always resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 2.

item.name: Sharp Horns
item.description: Attack Attribute. The model part may reroll the roll for the number of its Impact Hits.

item.name: Shield and Poisoned Javelin
Shield and Poisoned Javelin (3+)
item.description: - Shield: +1 Armour. - Poisoned Javelin: Shooting Weapon Range 12", Shots 1, Str as user, AP as user, Poison Attacks, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Skink Palanquin
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Stand Behind while it is joined to a unit of Saurian Warriors or Skink Braves that does not contain any Caiman models. In addition to its other spells, the model knows the Learned Spell 1 from its chosen Path and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

item.name: Soulfire Weaver
item.description: Every time the model successfully casts a spell from Evocation, it can choose to discard one or more Veil Tokens instead of casting the Attribute Spell. For each Veil Token discarded this way, choose one unengaged enemy unit within 12" of a target of the spell (no unit can be chosen more than once per spell). Each chosen unit suffers a hit with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, Area Attack (2x2), and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Sphere of Shielding
item.description: Models on Palanquin and Skink Palanquin only. The bearer gains Aegis (2+, against Ranged Attacks) and automatically fails all saves against Melee Attacks.

item.name: Spirit of the Stampede
item.description: The bearers mount gains Impact Hits (D6). If it already had Impact Hits, increase the number of Impact Hits by D6 instead.

item.name: Starfall Shard
item.description: The bearers model gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks) and Hard Target (1), and automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

item.name: Sun Tablet
item.description: The bearer always selects its spells from all Learned Spells of its chosen Path and Spark of Creation (Hereditary Spell). This overrides the Spell Selection rules connected for Wizard Apprentices, Adepts, and Essence of a Free Mind. This Artefact cannot be combined with Protean Potentate.

item.name: Symbiosis
item.description: The model may cast spells of any type through models with Telepathic Link. When casting spells through a Telepathic Link, the range of spells of type Damage without Aura is not reduced. Otherwise follow the normal rules for Telepathic Link.

item.name: Taurosaurs Vigour
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains +1 Armour and +1 Health Point.

item.name: Telepathic Link
item.description: A Cuatl Lord may cast spells of type Damage through a friendly model with Telepathic Link with the following conditions and restrictions: - The Cuatl Lord is considered to be the Caster. - The model with Telepathic Link must be within 24" of the Cuatl Lord. - The spell must have type Damage. - Line of Sight and Front Arc of the model with Telepathic Link are used. - The spells range is reduced by half and is measured from the model with Telepathic Link. - The Cuatl Lord may cast spells of type Missile even if it is Engaged in Combat, as long as the model with Telepathic Link is not. If the spell is Miscast, apply the following effects: - The Cuatl Lord suffers the Miscast effect as normal. - The model with Telepathic Link suffers a single hit with Armour Penetration 2 and a Strength equal to the number of Magic Dice used. If the Cuatl Lord casts a spell using Telepathic Link, the Attribute Spell gets cast through the model with Telepathic Link as well, applying the same conditions and restrictions listed above. If not all of the conditions are met, the Attribute Spell is not cast.

item.name: Totem Animal
item.description: Saurian Warriors may take one of the following Totem Animals. If a Saurian Warrior unit selects this option, then all Saurian Warriors in the army must be upgraded with the same Totem Animal. - Piranha: The model gains Fear. - Jaguar: The model gains +1" Advance Rate and +2" March Rate. - Serpent: The model gains +1 Agility and Fight in Extra Rank. - Crocodile: The model gains +1 Armour against Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Totem of Mixoatl
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count towards Core. The bearers unit gains Hard Target (1). One use only. May be activated at the start of a Round of Combat. Until the end of the Round of Combat, enemy units in base contact with the bearers unit suffer −3 Offensive Skill.

item.name: Trained from Birth
item.description: The model knows the Learned Spell 1 from its chosen Path in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

item.name: Tree Frog Banner
item.description: Close Combat Attacks from Skink* model parts in the bearers unit become Poison Attacks. *The following model parts are considered Skinks: Skink Captains, Skink Priests, Skink Braves, Skink Hunters, Chameleons, Pteradon Sentries - Rider only, Rhamphodon Riders - Rider only, Taurosaur - Crew only, Stygiosaur - Skink Rider only, Thyroscutus - Crew only.

item.name: Venomous Tide
item.description: Universal Rule. All models in enemy units must take a Dangerous Terrain (1) Test after successfully Charging a unit of Snake Swarms.

item.name: Wildfire Burst
item.description: Enchantment: Bow. This weapon has Shots 4, Str 4, AP 1 and always hits on 3+. Attacks made with this weapon become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks. A unit that is hit by one or more of these attacks loses Soft Cover until the end of the Player Turn (if it had it). If the enemy unit was in Hard Cover, it is now considered to be in Soft Cover until the end of the Player Turn.

item.name: Salamander
item.description: Spout Flames: Artillery Weapon. Flamethrower, Range 8", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks. If a Misfire is rolled, the Salamander always counts as rolling the 5+ Malfunction result.

item.name: Spearback
item.description: Shoot Spikes (4+): Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 2D6, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire. This weapon may not be used if the model performed a March Move in this Player Turn. Spearbacks must declare Stand and Shoot as a Charge Reaction if possible, but they do not suffer the −1 to-hit modifier for it.

item.name: Mystic Traveller
item.description: Universal Rule. The Skink Rider gains Telepathic Link and is a Wizard Adept that selects 2 spells from Awaken the Beast, Swarm of Insects, Savage Fury (Shamanism), and Spark of Creation (Hereditary Spell) during Spell Selection. This rule overrides the normal Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Adept.

item.name: Altar of the Snake-God
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains an additional model part: Snakes.

item.name: Sun Engine
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Channel (1).

rule.name: SA#25
rule.leftTerm: Taurosaur Option: Engine of the Ancients
